name: Pastelize
description:
Made for #screensaverjam - pastelize.

Made in 2 days with GameMaker Studio.

Press A/S/D, Z/X/C to manipulate the shapes that fly across the screen, use Q and E for screenshot or art purposes, use E to enter fullscreen. Fullscreen makes it really blurry though, so I don't recommend it. You can also use the arrow keys to move the shapes a little bit.

Bonus: a html project I made in Unity where colourful balls fly into an abyss.
